lead_paragraph: The French Court Martial at Rome tried, on the 26th ult., seven Italians, working-men, or farm laborers, for having assaulted a French sergeant named Lachaume, at Viterbo. On the ??h July the sergeant was standing before the guard-house, when nine Italians came up. One of them produced a large knife, and brandished it menacingly at the sergeant.
